alert.note: Alert for Cass (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 2:23PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miller, central Lafayette and northeastern Cass Counties through 300 PM CST... At 222 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Queen City, or near Atlanta, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Atlanta, Queen City, Fouke, Garland, Genoa, Brightstar, Mount Pleasant, Bloomburg, Douglassville, Domino, Pleasant Hill, Spirit Lake and Fort Lynn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southwestern Arkansas.
